wikimediacustomizations-attribution-rest: The Attribution API provides information about the attribution of a page.
wikimediacustomizations-attribution-endp: Get the attribution information for a page.
The schema for the Attribution API.
wikimediacustomizations-attribution-get-: The expand parameter allows the caller to include additional information in the response. The value is a comma-separated list of the keys to expand. The keys can be 'trust_and_relevance' or 'calls_to_action'.
The essential information about the page attribution.
The title of the requested page.
The uploader of the page.
The license of the page.
The URL of the license.
The title of the license.
The link to the page.
The site brand marks of the page.
The name of the site brand mark.
The URL of the site brand mark.
The type of the site brand mark.
The details about the source wiki of the page.
The name of the source wiki.
The type or 'family' of the source wiki.
The ID of the source wiki.
The content language of the wiki site.
The content language of the page.
The trust and relevance information about the page.
The number of contributor counts of the page.
The last modified date of the page.
The number of page views of the page for the last 30 days.
The calls to action information for the page.
The donation call to action objects for the page.
The default donation call to action URL.
The foundation donation call to action URL.
The donation call to action URL for the special occasions.
The participation call to action objects for the page.
The talk page call to action URL.
